The amount you can borrow with GLoan depends on your eligibility and account standing. Here are important details about GLoan:

1. **Loanable Amount**: You can borrow between **PHP 1,000 and PHP 125,000.**
2. **Payment Terms**: The repayment period can range from **1Â to 24 months**, depending on the loan amount and your eligibility.

**Note:** Getting a new GLoan after finishing the last one will depend on an eligibility check. Paying off the previous loan doesn't guarantee your next loan approval.
